name: 陳盈竹
objective:
課程將以介紹圖文編輯基礎搭配實際軟體操作各類型數位出版範例，在實務編排中學習掌握排版編輯之能力。操作練習包含數位簡章、數位雜誌、及數位書籍等，藉由練習達到視覺及資訊傳達之目的。
This course is an introduction to digital publication. Class aims for understanding the fundamental design rules and process for digital publication.  By working on design layouts such as Digital Flyer, Digital Magazines, and Digital Book, students can have experience on actual design process.
schedule:
01	Introduction
02	Case Study: Flyers
03	Flyer Exercise I
04	Flyer Exercise II & Discussion
05	Case Study: Brochure
06	Brochure Exercise I
07	Brochure Exercise II & Discussion
08	Mid-Review
09	Social Media
10	Social Media Exercise I
11	Social Media Exercise II & Discussion
12	Case Study: Digital Articles
13	Digital Article Exercise I
14	Digital Article Exercise II & Discussion
15	Case Study: Digital Book
16	Digital Book Exercise I
17	Digital Book Exercise II & Discussion
18	Final Review
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 15%
Class Exercise: 50%
Mid Review: 15%
Final Review: 20%
materials: class material will be provided by the instructor
